findings.title: Inconsistent Compiler Version
findings.description: Using different Solidity compiler versions can lead to inconsistencies and potential breaking changes, suggesting the use of a fixed compiler version.

findings.title: Inconsistency Between Implementation And Document
findings.description: The getContentURI() function in LensHub contract returns original mirrored publication's URI rather than empty when the type of the queried publication is mirror, which is inconsistent with the description in the specification.
